item.title: flask中通过fileconfig配置多个logger
item.description: Flask中如何通过配置文件配置logger 创建app.py文件 $ cat app.py from flask import Flask import logging import logging.config def configure_logger(app): logging.config.fileConfig("log.conf") # 获取当前所有的logger print logging.Logger.manager.loggerDict.keys() app.logger.info("logger start") def app_factory(): app = Flask('root') configure_logger(app)
